nodes.text: Veem Set was a male Rodian pirate living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was captured by Ord Mantell separatists and locked inside the separatist stronghold. Republic official Milo Phipps believed Set had important information on the Mantellian Separatist Movement that could potentially end the Separatist War and hired a sympathetic citizen to free him. However, Lieutenant Bendick had a different opinion and suggested that the blood-thirsty pirate could meet an unfortunate incident instead.
